preterite.spanish: Vi una película increíble anoche en el cine.
preterite.english: I saw an incredible movie last night at the cinema.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Viste el accidente desde tu ventana.
preterite.english: You saw the accident from your window.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Viste a tu ex en el supermercado ayer.
preterite.english: You saw your ex at the supermarket yesterday.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Vio las auroras boreales durante su viaje a Noruega.
preterite.english: He/She saw the northern lights during his/her trip to Norway.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Vimos el eclipse solar desde la terraza.
preterite.english: We saw the solar eclipse from the terrace.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Visteis el partido completo en el estadio.
preterite.english: You all saw the entire game at the stadium.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Vieron fuegos artificiales desde el balcón.
preterite.english: They saw fireworks from the balcony.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Veré a mis padres el próximo fin de semana.
future.english: I will see my parents next weekend.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Verás cosas increíbles en tu viaje a Asia.
future.english: You will see incredible things on your trip to Asia.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Verás que tenía razón sobre el proyecto.
future.english: You will see that I was right about the project.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Verá los resultados del examen mañana.
future.english: He/She will see the exam results tomorrow.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Veremos la nueva película de ciencia ficción.
future.english: We will see the new science fiction movie.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Veréis la diferencia después del cambio.
future.english: You all will see the difference after the change.
future.subject: vosotros

future.spanish: Verán el amanecer desde la montaña.
future.english: They will see the sunrise from the mountain.
future.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

preterite.spanish: Di mi opinión honesta sobre el proyecto.
preterite.english: I gave my honest opinion about the project.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Diste una excelente presentación ayer.
preterite.english: You gave an excellent presentation yesterday.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Diste todo de vos en el partido.
preterite.english: You gave your all in the game.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Dio una donación generosa a la caridad.
preterite.english: He/She gave a generous donation to charity.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Dimos la bienvenida a los nuevos estudiantes.
preterite.english: We welcomed the new students.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Disteis una fiesta sorpresa para mamá.
preterite.english: You all threw a surprise party for mom.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Dieron las gracias por toda la ayuda recibida.
preterite.english: They gave thanks for all the help received.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Daré lo mejor de mí en el nuevo trabajo.
future.english: I will give my best in the new job.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Darás una conferencia sobre tu investigación.
future.english: You will give a lecture about your research.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Darás el primer paso hacia tu sueño.
future.english: You will take the first step toward your dream.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Dará clases de piano a niños pequeños.
future.english: He/She will give piano lessons to young children.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Daremos una cena especial para celebrar.
future.english: We will give a special dinner to celebrate.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Daréis ejemplo con vuestro comportamiento.
future.english: You all will set an example with your behavior.
future.subject: vosotros

future.spanish: Darán la noticia en el noticiero de la noche.
future.english: They will give the news on the evening newscast.
future.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

preterite.spanish: Dije exactamente lo que pensaba sobre la situación.
preterite.english: I said exactly what I thought about the situation.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Dijiste palabras muy sabias en la reunión.
preterite.english: You said very wise words in the meeting.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Dijiste la verdad aunque fuera difícil.
preterite.english: You told the truth even though it was difficult.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Dijo que vendría pero nunca apareció.
preterite.english: He/She said he/she would come but never showed up.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Dijimos adiós con lágrimas en los ojos.
preterite.english: We said goodbye with tears in our eyes.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Dijisteis cosas muy bonitas en el discurso.
preterite.english: You all said very beautiful things in the speech.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Dijeron que el proyecto era imposible.
preterite.english: They said the project was impossible.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Diré mi opinión en la próxima reunión.
future.english: I will say my opinion in the next meeting.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Dirás unas palabras en la ceremonia de graduación.
future.english: You will say a few words at the graduation ceremony.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Dirás que sí cuando te propongan matrimonio.
future.english: You will say yes when they propose marriage to you.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Dirá la verdad sobre lo que pasó esa noche.
future.english: He/She will tell the truth about what happened that night.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Diremos nuestros votos matrimoniales en la iglesia.
future.english: We will say our wedding vows in the church.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Diréis lo que pensáis sin miedo.
future.english: You all will say what you think without fear.
future.subject: vosotros

future.spanish: Dirán sus nombres cuando llegue su turno.
future.english: They will say their names when their turn comes.
future.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

preterite.spanish: Supe la noticia por casualidad en el café.
preterite.english: I found out the news by chance at the café.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Supiste manejar la situación muy bien.
preterite.english: You knew how to handle the situation very well.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Supiste la respuesta antes que todos.
preterite.english: You knew the answer before everyone else.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Supo que había ganado la lotería por la radio.
preterite.english: He/She found out he/she had won the lottery on the radio.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Supimos del accidente por las noticias.
preterite.english: We found out about the accident from the news.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Supisteis guardar el secreto perfectamente.
preterite.english: You all knew how to keep the secret perfectly.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Supieron resolver el problema sin ayuda.
preterite.english: They knew how to solve the problem without help.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Sabré la respuesta después de investigar más.
future.english: I will know the answer after researching more.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Sabrás tocar el piano como un profesional.
future.english: You will know how to play piano like a professional.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Sabrás qué hacer cuando llegue el momento.
future.english: You will know what to do when the time comes.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Sabrá hablar chino después del curso intensivo.
future.english: He/She will know how to speak Chinese after the intensive course.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Sabremos los resultados mañana por la tarde.
future.english: We will know the results tomorrow afternoon.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Sabréis cocinar platos gourmet después del curso.
future.english: You all will know how to cook gourmet dishes after the course.
future.subject: vosotros

future.spanish: Sabrán la verdad cuando lean el informe completo.
future.english: They will know the truth when they read the complete report.
future.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes
